page.title: 05 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: To get an impression of employment patterns we asked 128 junior school children (8 to 11) what their parents did. Of those who answered we found 18 fathers in media, entertainment and publishing (9 in TV), 12 lawyers, 9 in sales or export, 7 in engineering, 7 in building, 5 teachers, 5 accountants, 4 in computers, 4 company directors, 4 in restaurants(2 owners), 3 policemen, 3 surveyors, 3 in banks, 2 photographers, 2 doctors, 2 architects, ship's officer, diplomat, senior civil servant, local government officer, author.... 47 mothers were housewives, 13 teachers, 11 nursery school helpers, 4 nurses, 11 secretaries, 3 social workers, 3 cooks, 3 shop assistants (1 owner), 4 in media, 2 cleaners, 2 barmaids, 1 lab.technician. 20 of these were said to work full-time.
